summary: iomap: iomap: fix memory corruption when recording errors during writeback
details:
iomap: iomap: fix memory corruption when recording errors during writeback

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 7308591d9c7787aec58f6a01a7823f14e90db7a2, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit e735c0079465900d78d687f00aba625d46426b29. For more details please see the references link.
